document.full_text: egypt's public prosecutor on sunday summoned hosni mubarak as part of probes into the killing of protesters and the embezzlement of public funds, but the ousted former president said allegations against him of wrongdoing were lies.
document.title: prosecutor to summon mubarak in deaths, graft probes
lines_and_colors: egypt's public prosecutor on sunday summoned hosni mubarak as part of probes into the killing of protesters and the embezzlement of public funds, but the ousted former president said allegations against him of wrongdoing were lies.
